name: Animation
description: Represents an Animation component for playing legacy animation clips.

instanceMethods.label: IsPlaying
instanceMethods.description: Checks if the given animation is playing.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation to check.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation to play.

parameters.name: fade
parameters.description: The fade time in seconds for cross-fading (default: 0.1).

parameters.name: layer
parameters.description: The animation layer to play on (default: 0).

instanceMethods.label: PlayAnimationAt
instanceMethods.description: Plays the specified animation starting from a normalized time.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation to play.

parameters.name: normalizedTime
parameters.description: The normalized time (0-1) to start the animation from.

parameters.name: fade
parameters.description: The fade time in seconds for cross-fading (default: 0.1).

parameters.name: layer
parameters.description: The animation layer to play on (default: 0).

instanceMethods.label: PlayAnimationQueued
instanceMethods.description: Plays the specified animation after the current animation finishes playing.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation to queue.

instanceMethods.label: StopAnimation
instanceMethods.description: Stops the specified animation. Will stop all animations if no name is given.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation to stop. If null, stops all animations.

instanceMethods.label: SetAnimationSpeed
instanceMethods.description: Sets the playback speed of the specified animation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the animation.

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: The playback speed multiplier (1.0 = normal speed).

instanceMethods.label: GetAnimationSpeed
instanceMethods.description: Gets the playback speed of the specified animation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the animation.

instanceMethods.label: GetAnimationLength
instanceMethods.description: Gets the length of the specified animation.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation.

instanceMethods.label: GetAnimationNormalizedTime
instanceMethods.description: Gets the normalized time of the specified animation.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation.

instanceMethods.label: SetAnimationNormalizedTime
instanceMethods.description: Sets the normalized playback time of the specified animation.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation.

parameters.name: normalizedTime
parameters.description: The normalized time (0-1) to set.

instanceMethods.label: SetAnimationWeight
instanceMethods.description: Sets the weight of the specified animation.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation.

parameters.name: weight
parameters.description: The weight value (0-1) to set.

instanceMethods.label: GetAnimationWeight
instanceMethods.description: Gets the weight of the specified animation.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation.
